snippet: A partnership would put the company closer to competing with channels like HBO.
abstract: Netflix is meeting with major cable operators to discuss a way for it appear on monthly cable bills; partnership would put the company closer to competing with premium channels like HBO.

headline.main: Netflix Said to Be Aiming for a Cable Partnership
headline.print_headline: Netflix Said to Be Aiming For a Cable Partnership

snippet: What we saw on Wednesday with Apple was a Plumbing Event. And the thing about Plumbing Events is, like most things regarding infrastructure, they are the least glamorous, but also the most important.
abstract: What we saw on Wednesday with Apple was a Plumbing Event. And the thing about Plumbing Events is, like most things regarding infrastructure, they are the least glamorous, but also the most important.

headline.main: There Are Three Kinds of Apple Events

snippet: There are three kinds of Apple product events. Today's unveiling of the iPad was a Plumbing Event. The Plumbing Events is, like most things regarding infrastructure, the least glamorous, but also the most important.
abstract: There are three kinds of Apple product events. Today's unveiling of the iPad was a Plumbing Event. The Plumbing Events is, like most things regarding infrastructure, the least glamorous, but also the most important.

snippet: About an hour after Apple said that its third-generation iPad would be available on AT&T and Verizon Wireless's 4G Long Term Evolution (LTE) networks, AT&T's press relations department e-mailed a statement claiming that it had the largest 4G netwo...
abstract: About an hour after Apple said that its third-generation iPad would be available on AT&T and Verizon Wireless's 4G Long Term Evolution (LTE) networks, AT&T's press relations department e-mailed a statement claiming that it had the largest 4G network in the nation. The problem is, AT&T is not referring to the same network as the 4G LTE feature that is brand new to the iPad.

headline.main: A Boast of the Biggest 4G Network for the iPad Is a Stretch
headline.print_headline: AT&T’s Boast About Using 4G Seems a Stretch

snippet: The new iPad has a high-definition screen, faster wireless connection and several other refinements for the same price as the old one, $499.

headline.main: Apple Adds Sharper Screen and Speed to New iPad
headline.print_headline: Apple Adds Sharper Screen and Speed to New iPad

snippet: A roundup of mobile apps to help vocalists with instrumental tracks and more.

headline.print_headline: Software for Both Solos and Sing-Alongs

snippet: The new iPad's hardware keeps Apple ahead of its tablet rivals - there's no other tablet, yet, with anything like these specs - but it's the software that really makes the iPad shine.
abstract: The new iPad's hardware keeps Apple ahead of its tablet rivals - there's no other tablet, yet, with anything like these specs - but it's the software that really makes the iPad shine.

headline.main: The New iPad: It's in the Apps

snippet: In an updated prospectus, Facebook said it had doubled its credit facility to $5 billion. It has also secured a $3 billion bridge loan, to help pay for taxes associated with the vesting of employee stock.
abstract: In an updated prospectus, Facebook said it had doubled its credit facility to $5 billion. It has also secured a $3 billion bridge loan, to help pay for taxes associated with the vesting of employee stock.

headline.main: Facebook Borrows $3 Billion and Increases Line of Credit
headline.print_headline: Facebook Borrows $3 Billion and Increases Line of Credit

snippet: New gallerists, most with more hope than cash, are fixing a gritty neighborhood into an art scene.
abstract: Scrappy newcomers to the gallery scene, most with more hope than cash, are seeking to transform the gritty industrial neighborhood of Bushwick, Brooklyn, into New York's next big art destination.

snippet: Photos of the iPad taken with the new Lytro camera are particularly impressive on the closeups of the new retina display screen. See a collection we took at Wednesday's Apple event.
